thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 3 of 25
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text: Good value for money, like estimate bill facility. Area for improvement would be to proactively contact be before my 12 month contract expires to discuss a new deal for another potential 12 months rather than relying on me having to know when 12 month contract expires and if I do not make contact with energia or remember to shop around then I am going on to a more expensive contract.
